title: Lyra McKee: Men arrested over journalist's murder released
article: Four men arrested by police investigating the murder of Lyra McKee have been released pending a report to the Public Prosecution Service (PPS). Three of the men, aged 36, 39 and 45, were detained in Londonderry on Tuesday under the Terrorism Act. The fourth, aged 63 was arrested in the city on Monday. Journalist Ms McKee, 29, wasshot while observing rioting in the Creggan estate in April 2019.
